title: 1997년 Soo Line Railroad Company, Plaintiff-Appellant/cross-Appellee v. St. Louis Southwestern Railway Company, Defendant-Appellee/cross-Appellant 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Soo Line Railroad Company, Plaintiff-Appellant/cross-Appellee v. St. Louis Southwestern Railway Company, Defendant-Appellee/cross-Appellant. 판결일: 1997-09-08. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: SOO LINE RAILROAD COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant/Cross-Appellee, v. ST. LOUIS SOUTHWESTERN RAILWAY COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee/Cross-Appellant
**판결일**: 1997-09-08
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Evans, Kanne, Posner

## 변호인

Michael W. Rathsack (argued), Thomas L. Hogan, Connelly & Schroeder, Soo Line Railroad Company, Chicago, IL, for Plaintiff-AppellanVCross-Appellee., Richard M. Kates (argued), Chicago, IL, for Defendant-Appellee/Cross-Appellant.

## 인용

- 125 F.3d 481

## 판결문 요약

125 F.3d 481
    39 Fed.R.Serv.3d 205
    SOO LINE RAILROAD COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant/Cross-Appellee,v.ST. LOUIS SOUTHWESTERN RAILWAY COMPANY,Defendant-Appellee/Cross-Appellant.
    Nos. 96-3842 & 96-3928.
    United States Court of Appeals,Seventh Circuit.
    Argued May 15, 1997.Decided Sept. 8, 1997.
    
      Michael W. Rathsack (argued), Thomas L. Hogan, Connelly & Schroeder, Soo Line Railroad Company, Chicago, IL, for Plaintiff-Appellant/Cross-Appellee.
      Richard M. Kates (argued), Chicago, IL, for Defendant-Appellee/Cross-Appellant.
      Before POSNER, Chief Judge, and KANNE and EVANS, Circuit Judges.
      KANNE, Circuit Judge.
    
    
      1
      This case concerns a contract between the Soo Line Railroad Company (Soo) and the St. Louis Southwest Railway Company (SSW) under which SSW agreed to "interchange" railroad freight cars through its Armourdale rail yard in Kansas City, Kansas.1  SSW also agreed to perform certain services on these cars at the Armourdale yard.  This interchange agreement covered both cars entering the yard from the Soo and cars leaving the yard to the Soo.
    
    
      2
      Before cars leaving the yard could reach the Soo, however, they had to pass over tracks owned by the Kansas City Terminal (KCT).  The KCT imposed "zone" charges on these cars, and the Soo paid approximately $900,000 in these charges between September 1984 and June 1991.  The contract between the Soo and SSW, however, provided:
